LanguageData.ZP_RoastedMochi.label: Grilled Mochi
LanguageData.ZP_RoastedMochi.description: It's baked mochi with nothing else added.
LanguageData.ZP_VinegarMochi.label: Vinegar Mochi
LanguageData.ZP_VinegarMochi.description: Mochi with vinegar and grated Japanese radish (Daikon). A common dish in the Kyushu area.
LanguageData.ZP_IsobeMochi.label: Isobe Mochi
LanguageData.ZP_IsobeMochi.description: Mochi baked, soaked with soy sauce, and wrapped in seaweed.
LanguageData.ZP_GoheiMochi.label: Gohei Mochi
LanguageData.ZP_GoheiMochi.description: Mochi baked on an iron plate and seasoned with miso.
